title: Business Director_Experience
content:
The Role: 
We're looking for an experienced Business Director passionate about transforming customer experiences through innovative CRM strategies. As the visionary leader of our agency, you'll drive the evolution of our CRM initiatives, leveraging customer data to identify growth opportunities and foster exceptional relationships. Your strategic acumen and inclusive leadership will be pivotal in championing diversity within our agency while crafting innovative strategies that enhance customer loyalty and satisfaction.
Your role as Business Director will encompass spearheading the agency's CRM focus, translating insights from customer data into actionable plans that adapt to market dynamics. Your exceptional communication skills will be key as you forge and nurture relationships, inspiring confidence among clients and colleagues alike. Embodying our values, you'll champion inclusivity, fostering a workplace culture where every team member feels valued and respected.
Moreover, you will play a pivotal role in driving a customer-centric mindset across the agency, instilling a deep understanding of the importance of CRM methodologies in every aspect of our operations. Your strategic guidance will not only reshape customer experiences but also set the tone for how we interpret and utilize data, ensuring that our decisions are rooted in customer insights. As the orchestrator of our CRM initiatives, you'll be at the helm of pioneering approaches that not only meet but exceed customer expectations, solidifying our agency's reputation as an industry leader in delivering unparalleled customer satisfaction and loyalty.
Key Responsibilities:   

Strategic Planning & Implementation: Develop and execute growth strategies aligned with the agency's objectives, emphasising enhanced customer experiences and loyalty through data-driven initiatives.
Business Development & Relationship Building: Identify and nurture new business prospects, cultivating strong stakeholder relationships to expand the agency's clientele and prioritise customer-centric approaches.
Collaborative Leadership: Lead cross-functional teams in crafting tailored proposals and strategies, aligning creative and account efforts toward customer-focused campaigns and experiences.
Data-Driven Insights: Utilise market research and analysis to spot industry trends and opportunities, focusing on enhancing customer satisfaction and loyalty while meeting evolving client needs.
Client Relationship Management: Cultivate client relationships, emphasising strategies for continued growth and customer-centric experiences that meet and exceed their expectations.
Thought Leadership & Insights: Offer industry insights both internally and externally, advising clients on best practices for customer engagement and loyalty through data-driven methodologies.
Pitch Development & Communication: Create compelling proposals showcasing the agency's expertise in delivering exceptional customer experiences, effectively articulating complex strategies to potential clients.
Industry Engagement: Stay abreast of industry trends, attending conferences and networking events to reinforce the agency's leadership in customer-centric strategies and experiences.
Team Mentorship: Guide and mentor the new business team, emphasising customer-centric methodologies and supporting their professional development.

Requirements: 

Strategic CRM Leadership: Proven track record in providing visionary leadership specifically within CRM-driven initiatives, elevating customer experiences, and enhancing loyalty while achieving business growth.
Visionary Planning & Execution: Ability to conceptualize innovative CRM strategies and effectively execute them to revolutionise customer experiences and loyalty within the industry.
Mentorship & Leadership Excellence: Demonstrated ability to lead and inspire teams, fostering a culture of excellence in CRM-focused endeavours while nurturing talent and expertise.
Data-Driven Decision Making: Strong analytical prowess in leveraging data insights to guide strategic decisions specifically tailored to optimizing and enhancing customer experiences.
Business Pitch Mastery: Proficiency in crafting compelling and persuasive business pitches, showcasing expertise in delivering customer-centric solutions to potential clients.
Adaptability & Innovation: Proven ability to innovate and adapt CRM strategies in response to dynamic market conditions, continually enhancing customer experiences.
Effective Cross-Functional Communication: Exceptional communication skills tailored to articulating complex CRM strategies, fostering seamless collaboration across diverse teams.
Industry Insights & Expertise: In-depth knowledge of industry trends, with a specific emphasis on CRM technologies, digital marketing, and customer loyalty programs, informing strategic decisions.
Inclusive Leadership: Commitment to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace, integrating these values into CRM strategies and leadership approaches to encourage diversity and equity within the team.

How we help you Thrive: 

25 days annual leave + 1 Volunteer Day 
Bupa Healthcare
Enhanced Maternity, Adoption and Shared Parental Leave
We have a Flexible Working Model with core working hours: 10am – 4pm
A 1.5:1 Matching Pension Structure
Wellbeing and Health: Up to £25.00 per month towards physical or online exercise class membership, Unmind membership, LifeWorks tool and annual eye tests and development budgets and Wellbeing incentives and activities throughout the year 
Season Ticket Loan and Cycle to Work Scheme
Life Assurance

Our ambition is to attract the very best diverse talent to Ogilvy, and to be the employer of choice in the UK. We want everyone to feel welcome when they join us, and once they’re here, for them to want to stay with us, grow their career, and to feel they belong with us.  
 


At Ogilvy, our people are at the heart of what we do: a creative agency that sparks game-changing ideas across culture and business through collaboration, integrity, and a celebration of self-expression. 
We believe in building powerful teams with purpose. This means hiring and nurturing talent across all races, ethnicities, religions, abilities, sexual orientation, and gender identities – and we relentlessly curate transformative initiatives that make our commitment to fairness, and equity a reality. 
Our ultimate mission is to leave a positive impact on the world, creating a better future for all, while supporting and uplifting the global communities we serve.  This is central to our mantra of Borderless Creativity.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.

demographic_questions.description:
At Ogilvy we pride ourselves on being an inclusive and equal opportunities employer. We believe in creating a dynamic work environment that values diversity, equity and inclusion.  We strive to recruit from a diverse range of candidates and create an environment which provides the right conditions for belonging. We welcome all applications regardless of race, colour, religion or belief, gender, gender identity, age, national origin, marital status, , sexual orientation and physical or mental disability etc. (please note this is not an exhaustive list). We are also actively focussed on encouraging greater representation by bringing more under-represented talent into our organisation. This is hugely important to us and Ogilvy has a thriving network of employee communities that exist to help everyone, no matter their background, succeed here.

In order to help us achieve this and hold ourselves accountable for progress and monitor our efforts, we invite you to answer the following questions. You are not required to answer any of them, as they are entirely voluntary. They will also not be viewable to those interviewing you as part of your application or candidate profile. If you choose to answer, please know that all data is stored separately, used in aggregate for reporting purposes and handled as per GDPR regulations.
